[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/genesis/git.rs] [Function: ReleaseBundle::read] [Framework Verification] Is the Move framework bytecode verified for correctness and safety before being used in genesis? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/genesis/git.rs] [Function: Client operations] [Secure Deletion] Are sensitive files (like tokens or private configurations) securely deleted after use, or can they be recovered? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/genesis/git.rs] [Function: from_base64_encoded_yaml] [Replay Attack] Can old or revoked genesis configurations be replayed by reusing cached base64-encoded data? (High)
[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/genesis/git.rs] [Function: Client::github()] [Certificate Validation] Does the GitHub client properly validate TLS certificates to prevent MITM attacks? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/genesis/git.rs] [Function: Token::read_token] [Token Entropy] Is there sufficient entropy in the token generation/storage process to prevent brute force attacks? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/genesis/git.rs] [Function: Client::put()] [File Permission] Are created files and directories given appropriate permissions, or can unauthorized users read sensitive genesis data? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/genesis/git.rs] [Function: Client::local()] [Repository Access Control] Does local repository access check user permissions, or can any user on the system modify genesis configurations? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/genesis/git.rs] [Function: GithubClient] [Repository Permissions] Can attackers with limited GitHub access escalate privileges by manipulating genesis files? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/genesis/git.rs] [Function: create_dir_if_not_exist] [Directory Permissions] Are created directories world-readable, allowing unauthorized access to genesis configuration? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/genesis/git.rs] [Function: Client::get_framework()] [Framework Access] Can unauthorized users replace the framework file before it's loaded during genesis? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/genesis/git.rs] [Function: Token::FromDisk] [Token File Permissions] Is the GitHub token file protected with restrictive permissions (e.g., 0600), or can other users read it? (High)
[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/genesis/git.rs] [Function: write_to_file] [Umask Bypass] Can the system umask be manipulated to create files with insecure permissions? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/genesis/git.rs] [Function: SetupGit::execute()] [Authorization Check] Does SetupGit verify that only authorized operators can initialize genesis, or can any user run this command? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/genesis/git.rs] [Function: Client::create_dir()] [Directory Ownership] Are created directories owned by the correct user/group, or can ownership be hijacked? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/genesis/git.rs] [Function: GithubRepo validation] [Repository Authorization] Does the code verify that users have write access to the GitHub repository before attempting operations? (Medium)
[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/genesis/git.rs] [Function: Client::put()] [Partial Write] If write_to_file fails midway, can partially written files corrupt the genesis configuration? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/genesis/git.rs] [Function: Layout::from_disk] [Schema Validation] Does Layout deserialization validate all required fields and constraints, or can invalid layouts corrupt genesis? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/genesis/git.rs] [Function: Client::get_framework()] [Bytecode Corruption] Can corrupted or truncated framework files pass BCS deserialization and corrupt the Move VM state? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/genesis/git.rs] [Function: to_yaml()] [Serialization Consistency] Can different YAML serialization formats across validators cause inconsistent genesis configurations? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/genesis/git.rs] [Function: Client operations] [Transactional Safety] Are multiple file operations transactional, or can partial failures leave the genesis repository in an inconsistent state? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/genesis/git.rs] [Function: from_yaml()] [Floating Point Precision] Can floating point values in YAML lose precision during deserialization, causing balance inconsistencies? (Medium)
[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/genesis/git.rs] [Function: Client::get()] [Character Encoding] Can inconsistent character encoding across files cause parsing errors or data corruption? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/genesis/git.rs] [Function: base64 operations] [Encoding Consistency] Can different base64 implementations or line-ending variations cause inconsistent decoding across validators? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/genesis/git.rs] [Function: ReleaseBundle deserialization] [Version Mismatch] Can framework version mismatches between serialization and deserialization corrupt the Move framework? (High)
[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/genesis/git.rs] [Function: serde_yaml] [Numeric Overflow] Can very large numeric values in YAML overflow during deserialization into smaller integer types? (Medium)
